Operation: Distill

Complete the operation. Win awesome prizes!

Thursday, August 7th at 8:00AM until Friday, August 8th at 6:00PM

About

Participate in Operation: Distill during the conference and compete to win prizes and interact with fellow attendees. Challenges will include activities like:

  • Searching the conference and kickoff party venues to find hidden QR codes
  • Answering trivia questions
  • Collecting secret codewords
  • Snapping photos
  • Screenshots of your #distill14 tweets
  • Checking in via GPS
  • All tasks must be completed via the Scavify app.

Rewards

  • Most points or first to complete all challenges: $250 Amazon Gift Card
  • Runner Up: Google Nexus 7
  • Third Place: Jawbone Up
  • Best Kickoff Party Photo: Sphero
  • Best Sports Photo: Glow-in-the-dark bocce set
  • Tastiest Photo: Chemex
  • Best Robot Photo: Raspberry Pi Model B
  • Head of the class (most tweets): Distill 2013 Chrome Bag
  • Distill MVP (Best Photo with New Friends): Distill Staff t-shirt

Directions for participating

You’ll have a chance to win some amazing prizes by participating in Operation: Distill. Follow these steps to get started!

  1. Download - Download the “Scavify” app from the Apple App Store or Android Google Play.
  2. Join the Hunt - Open the app, sign up to create a username and password, and search for “Operation: Distill.”
  3. Play - Complete tasks to win awesome prizes, keep track of your score, and interact with other attendees.

Code of Conduct

Engine Yard is dedicated to providing an enjoyable, respectful and harassment-free event experience for everyone. We do not tolerate harassment of event participants in any form and we expect all participants to conduct themselves in a professional and appropriate manner. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate. Please do not take photos of anyone without their explicit consent.

Our anti-harassment statement can be found in full here.
